A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie has been out for a full year\, and has zero approved quotes on RT. Terrible plot holes\, a complete disregard for 30 years of Star Wars fandom\, and a lack of any true story continuity as they attempt to switch to a woefully unprepared director. Forcefeeds social justice themes into scenes where they only take away from an already poweful message. Characters break their own plot and momentum. \n\nA travesty only buoyed by \"critcs\" assuming that hardcore fans would love it\, when they are the ones punished most by this abomination.
